572630.name: LyraVR
572630.description:
LyraVR is a music creation app that offers everyone a unique music-making experience.

Compose your music in 3D space with virtual reality. Experiment and play with your compositions like never before. Create intricate loops and hand place your sounds. Control, weave and sculpt music sequences. Perform your creations in real-time and pioneer a radical new form of sound art.

Features


  • Create interactive soundscapes with LyraVR’s unique spatial music sequencer
  • 5 Virtual instrument controllers from keyboards to drum pads
  • Connect together 15 kinds of instrument nodes to compose musical sequences
  • 3D spatial audio support for an immersive auditory experience
  • 6 Environments
  • Perform and record your set with third person spectator cam
  • Import/Export/Record WAV
  • Includes royalty-free pro samples from Loopmasters
572630.supported_languages: 英语, 法语, 日语, 俄语, 简体中文, 繁体中文, 意大利语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙
